name: Hummus
description: A creamy dip made from chickpeas, perfect as a spread or side.
instruction: Blend chickpeas, tahini, garlic, lemon juice, and olive oil until smooth. Season with salt.

name: Soy Beef Soup
description: A flavorful soup with soy-based ground 'beef' and vegetables.
instruction: Sauté onion, garlic, and soy mince. Add vegetables, broth, and spices. Simmer for 30 minutes.

name: Tofu Broccoli Stew With Rice
description: A hearty stew with tofu, broccoli, and rice.
instruction: Fry tofu, add broccoli and sauce. Serve with cooked rice.

name: Noodle Wok
description: An Asian-style noodle stir-fry with crispy vegetables.
instruction: Boil noodles. Stir-fry vegetables and mix with noodles and sauce.

name: Egg & Avocado Toast
description: Quick breakfast toast with avocado and egg.
instruction: Toast bread, mash avocado, and top with a cooked egg.

name: Tofu & Chanterelle Ramen
description: A flavorful ramen with tofu and chanterelle mushrooms.
instruction: Cook noodles and broth. Fry mushrooms and tofu, then add everything to a bowl.

name: Pasta Arrabiata
description: A spicy pasta dish with tomato sauce and chili.
instruction: Boil pasta. Sauté garlic and chili in oil, add tomatoes. Mix with pasta.

name: Chicken Masala
description: A spicy curry with chicken and tomato-based sauce.
instruction: Sauté onion, garlic, and spices. Add chicken and tomato sauce. Cook until done.

name: Chick Pea Stew
description: A warming stew with chickpeas and vegetables.
instruction: Sauté onion, add chickpeas, tomato, broth, and spices. Let simmer.

name: Vegetarian Lunchbox
description: A filling vegetarian lunchbox with balanced ingredients.
instruction: Prepare veggies, rice or quinoa, and a protein source. Distribute in containers.

name: Veggie Salad
description: A fresh salad with mixed vegetables and dressing.
instruction: Chop vegetables, mix with dressing and desired toppings.

name: Plant Based Tacos
description: Vegan tacos filled with plant-based protein and fresh toppings.
instruction: Cook the filling, warm taco shells, and top with salad and salsa.

name: Protein Packed Lunchbox
description: A protein-packed lunchbox for busy or active days.
instruction: Combine cooked legumes, grains, and vegetables. Pack into containers.

name: Lemon Cheescake
description: A creamy lemon cheesecake with a crispy crust.
instruction: Make crust from crushed cookies and butter, bake. Fill with lemon cream and chill.
